review_text: Everything was perfect! Quite, cozy place to relax.
tags: Business trip~Solo traveller~Junior Suite~Stayed 1 night~Submitted via mobile
suggestion: Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We're delighted to hear that you found our hotel to be a quiet and cozy place to relax. As a Silver Member, we appreciate your loyalty and are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us. Since you've shown interest in yoga classes, we'd like to invite you to join our complimentary yoga sessions during your next visit. Our yoga classes are designed to enhance your relaxation experience, and we think you'll really enjoy them. We look forward to welcoming you back and providing another perfect stay!

review_title: I highly recommend this b&b! We enjoyed it a lot!
review_text: Very friendly host and perfect breakfast!
tags: Leisure trip~Couple~Deluxe Suite~Stayed 1 night~Submitted via mobile
suggestion: Response: We're delighted to hear that our host made you feel welcome and that you enjoyed a perfect breakfast during your stay. We appreciate your appreciation for our services and are glad we could meet your expectations, especially in terms of value for money. For your future visits, we're exploring options to enhance our payment flexibility, so you have more convenience. Thank you for choosing us, and we look forward to serving you again, perhaps for another special occasion like a wedding, where we can offer you our bespoke wedding arrangements.

review_text:
It was just what we wanted for a week by the beach in winter,

Location was fab, apartment quiet and very well-equipped. Spotless clean.
tags: Leisure trip~Couple~Apartment with Sea View~Stayed 6 nights~Submitted via mobile
suggestion: Response: Thank you for choosing our beachfront property for your winter getaway. We're delighted to hear that our location and apartment amenities met your expectations, and that you appreciated the cleanliness of your space. As a valued Silver Member, we're glad you had a wonderful stay. For your next visit, consider exploring our spa treatments or taking advantage of our tennis court facilities to enhance your relaxation and leisure experience. We look forward to welcoming you back and providing another exceptional stay.

review_title: My stay in the house was a experiencing bliss in luxury. The house is sheer touch of beauty wrapped
review_text: My stay in the house was a experiencing bliss in luxury. The house is sheer touch of beauty wrapped by luxury and complimented with kindness and care  from Lisbette & her parents making it a most remarkable stay.
tags: Business trip~Solo traveller~Junior Suite~Stayed 4 nights~Submitted via mobile
suggestion: Response: We're absolutely delighted to hear that your stay with us was a blissful experience in luxury. It's wonderful to know that Lisbette and her parents made your stay truly remarkable with their kindness and care. We're thrilled that you appreciated the beauty and luxury of our house. Although you mentioned being budget-friendly as one of your preferences, it's clear that the exceptional service and warm hospitality you received made your stay truly unforgettable. We look forward to welcoming you back and providing another exceptional experience. As a valued guest, we'd like to offer you a special loyalty discount on your next booking, so be sure to reach out to us directly for more information.

review_title: One bedroom apartment with wonderful view and free, secure parking, but not close enough  to the main beach area.
review_text:
The building itself has a very musty smell in the hallway (despite being built in 1988), but the apartment itself smells good, which makes it bearable. 
When showering, the hot water goes off every 2-3 minutes for about 20-30 seconds and then only cold water comes out. The hot water then comes back again. This should be checked out. That is the only thing we didn’t like about the apartment. ,

The view was great, the apartment furnished in a modern style and equipped with everything you may need. The apartment was clean. 
There is free, secure parking outside in the building’s parking lot or downstairs in the garage. 
Jan always responded promptly to all messages sent via Booking.com messenger.
tags: Leisure trip~People with friends~Apartment with Sea View~Stayed 4 nights~Submitted via mobile
